trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /><see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" /> events.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona datos para los eventos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /><see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged" /> y <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control changes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> evento se desencadena cuando el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> controlar los cambios.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> event is raised when the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> property changes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged> evento se desencadena cuando el valor de la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A> cambios de propiedad.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener más información sobre el control de eventos, vea [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to process the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo procesar el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided at [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso incluido en [Cómo: automáticamente cambiar el tamaño de las celdas cuando los cambios de contenido en el DataGridView Control de formularios Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se estableció la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> previamente en cualquier valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> distinto de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> o si se estableció la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> previamente en cualquier valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> distinto de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: When implementing a source for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events, pass in `true` for `previousModeAutoSized` if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> already had an automatic resizing mode and the new mode is different.
trans-unit.target: Al implementar un origen para <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos, se pasan en `true` para `previousModeAutoSized` si el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> ya tenía un modo de cambio de tamaño automático y el nuevo modo es diferente.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> was previously set to automatically resize.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que especifica si se ha establecido el control <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> previamente para cambiar el tamaño de forma automática.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> or the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> property was previously set to any <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> value other than <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se estableció la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode" /> previamente en cualquier valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode" /> distinto de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowsMode.None" /> o si se estableció la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> previamente en cualquier valor de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode" /> distinto de <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.DisableResizing" /> o <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeadersWidthSizeMode.EnableResizing" />; en caso contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> class is used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> events, so this property relates specifically to the previous state of either the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs> clase se utiliza con la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> y <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeModeChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> eventos, por lo que esta propiedad se relaciona específicamente a su estado anterior de uno de ellos la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowHeadersWidthSizeMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs.PreviousModeAutoSized%2A> property to check the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> value for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: El siguiente ejemplo de código utiliza el <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeModeEventArgs.PreviousModeAutoSized%2A> property para comprobar la anterior <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizeRowsMode%2A> valor para un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided at [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte de un ejemplo más extenso incluido en [Cómo: automáticamente cambiar el tamaño de las celdas cuando los cambios de contenido en el DataGridView Control de formularios Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md).
